# Basketball

Basketball is currently supported for the following leagues (in alphabetical order):

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1

league-basketball-fiba
league-basketball-nba
league-basketball-nba-g-league
league-basketball-ncaa
league-basketball-nfhs
league-basketball-wnba
```

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: sportypy.surfaces.basketball
    :members: BasketballCourt
```
